task.title: Add a Note to a Card
task.shortdesc: Annotate a card by adding a note to it. Other users who you have shared the board with can view the note and add notes of their own.

step.cmd: In the left navigation menu, click Feed, then click the desired card to open it.

info.p: In the left navigation menu, click Boards, click the desired board to display its contents, then click the desired card to open it.

p.note: You can also right-click the card or long-click the card on a tablet to display additional options. Click to display the card in edit mode.

step.cmd: In the Add Note box, type your comment.
Click Comment to save your note.
